data.description:
Get ready for a spine-chilling adventure like no other with the upcoming gorilla tag horror fan game. As night falls, players are thrown into a heart-pounding chase through ominous landscapes, where terrifying gorilla predators lurk around every corner. With each step, fear grips tighter, pushing players to strategize and outwit their adversaries to survive. From eerie ruins to haunted forests, every environment is a haunting playground where nightmares come alive. In this relentless pursuit, teamwork is crucial as players band together to defy the darkness and conquer their fears. With its immersive gameplay and relentless tension, this upcoming title promises to deliver an unforgettable horror experience. Brace yourself for the ultimate test of courage and survival.

In this gripping gorilla tag horror fan game, players must navigate through treacherous terrain while evading the relentless pursuit of terrifying gorilla predators. With heart-pounding gameplay and atmospheric environments, every moment is fraught with tension and danger. Whether sprinting through narrow corridors or hiding in the shadows, strategic thinking and quick reflexes are paramount to survival. As the stakes escalate, players must rely on teamwork and determination to overcome the nightmarish challenges that lie ahead. Get ready for an adrenaline-fueled experience that will keep you on the edge of your seat until the very end.

changelog.change_log:
Release Notes - Version 4.8
---
About The Update

The latest update to Project Bandit Horror has plunged players into an even deeper abyss of terror, with spine-chilling new adventures awaiting around every shadowy corner. From haunted asylums to abandoned mansions, the game's new environments are meticulously crafted to evoke a sense of dread and foreboding. Enhanced graphics and immersive sound design intensify the experience, blurring the lines between reality and nightmare. As players navigate through the eerie landscapes, they encounter ghastly apparitions and unearth sinister secrets hidden within the game's twisted narrative. With each heart-pounding encounter, the stakes are raised, ensuring that players are left trembling in fear long after they've removed their VR headsets. Brace yourself for a descent into darkness like never before, as the updated Version Of Project Bandit Horror pushes the boundaries of fear and adrenaline to new heights.
---

VERSION 4.8 IS OUT (Had a lot of issues Last update so I jumped a couple of updates.)

We're thrilled to announce the release of Version 4.7! This update brings several exciting additions and fixes that enhance your gameplay experience. Here's what's new:

Added:

- New Water Mechanics: Dive into an improved aquatic experience with revamped water mechanics, making your interactions with water more dynamic and engaging.
  
- Hidden Collectible Button: Explore each level thoroughly to discover hidden collectible buttons scattered throughout the game. Can you find them all?

- Level RUN: Embark on a thrilling adventure with the addition of the new level "RUN." Get ready to test your skills and reflexes in this exciting challenge.

- Trusted User Vents: Access exclusive vents designated for trusted users, offering shortcuts and strategic advantages within the game world.

Fixed:

- Water Looking Weird: Bid farewell to odd water visuals as we've addressed the issue causing water to appear unusual.

- PVP Hammer: Enjoy fair and balanced player-versus-player encounters now that the PVP Hammer bug has been resolved.

- Mod Vent Issues: Mods can now navigate vents smoothly without encountering any unexpected issues.

- Getting Stuck on the Monster: While the issue of getting stuck on monsters has been tackled, please note that there might still be occasional glitches related to this. We're actively monitoring and working to resolve any remaining issues.

- Seeing Cosmetics in Your Face: Say goodbye to cosmetic items obstructing your view as we've fixed the problem of cosmetics appearing too prominently.

- Movement: Experience smoother and more responsive movement controls following fixes implemented to enhance overall gameplay fluidity.

- Hopefully Trampoline Bugs: We've addressed various bugs related to trampolines, ensuring a more consistent and enjoyable bouncing experience for all players.

We're grateful for your continued support and feedback as we strive to provide the best gaming experience possible. Keep exploring, discovering, and enjoying the adventures that await in our game!

Stay tuned for more updates and exciting content in the future. See you in the game!

Sincerely,
Purple Bandit Productions
